source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_00<tab>Kupli Kuki is wringing his pom-pom trying to figure out where his companion went.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_00<tab>Kupli Kuki se demande où est passé son autre compagnon...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_01<tab>Kupli Kuki uses his powers of deduction to determine that the last possible refuge for his lost moogle friend is to the south. However, since that area is just bound to be overflowing with wild beasts, he asks you to go ahead of the two moogles and look for any evidence of his lost companion before they risk their lives in an effortless search. Search Hengr's Crucible for any signs of the nervous moogle.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_01<tab>Kupli Kuki pense que son compagnon est allé sur l'île du Creuset de Hengr et vous a demandé d'inspecter les lieux. Allez chercher des indices sur la piste du dernier Mog égaré.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_02<tab>You search the area and you find an errant kupo nut and a few feathers that look like they came from a bird of significant size. It would be a shame if a moogle was left alone without his kupo nuts, so return the evidence to Kupli Kuki and see what he has to say about his lost partner.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez trouvé <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B760202 /var> et deux <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8B770302 /var>. Rapportez ces indices à Kupli Kuki.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_03<tab>Kupli Kuki examines the kupo nut and feathers, guessing that the most likely occurrence was that his poor companion was kidnapped by one of the many large birds soaring the skies in the area. Follow him to where the birds build their nests and see if he has any insight as to where the other moogle may be.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_03<tab>En se basant sur les indices que vous leur avez fournis, les Mogs ont conclu que leur compagnon avait dû être emporté par le gros oiseau noir qui les avait attaqués. Ils sont alors im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment partis à la recherche du repaire de ces volatiles. Rejoignez-les et demandez à Kupli Kuki ce qu'il compte faire.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_04<tab>You meet up with the two moogles, and the area is teeming with giant birds that match the feathers you found previously. Kupli Kuki asks you to help them search for their friend before one of the birds gets hungry and does something terrible to the moogle.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_04<tab>Comme vous vous y attendiez, Kupli Kuki vous a demandé de fouiller l'île du Nidifice à la recherche de son compagnon. Prenez votre courage à deux mains, et tâchez de retrouver le dernier Mog égaré.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_05<tab>After searching every nook and cranny of the area, you find the moogle cowering in a nest, apparently in an attempt to blend in with the many eggs. He is relieved that he was able to avoid becoming fodder for the birds, and returns to reunite with his Twelveswood companions.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_05<tab>Le dernier Mog était caché dans le nid d'un des gros oiseaux noirs, tentant dé<var 16 /var>ses<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ré<var 16 /var>ment de se faire passer pour un œuf quand vous l'avez retrouvé. Allez rapporter la bonne nouvelle à Kupli Kuki.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_06<tab>All three moogles have been reunited at last, and they can finally move on from this confusing episode to meet their moogle brethren in Moghome. Aid them in their journey to the Churning Mists for what is sure to be a party to remember.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_SEQ_06<tab>Grâce à vous, les Mogs de la forêt sont enfin réunis et vont pouvoir rejoindre les Mogs célestes à L'Écume des cieux de Dravania.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_TODO_00<tab>Look for clues of the missing moogle's whereabouts.
TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_TODO_01<tab>Bring the clues to Kupli Kuki.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_TODO_01<tab>Donner les indices à Kupli Kuki

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Kupli Kuki at the Nidifice.
TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_002<tab>Oh... Where did he wander off to, kupo?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_002<tab>Je ne vois pas où il peut être, kupo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_000<tab>If I can say one thing about my companion, it's that he's quite adept at fleeing, kupo! Hmmm... If it were <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> running, I'd go...to the south!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_000<tab>En tout cas, il est vraiment doué pour s'enfuir. Je me demande s'il ne serait pas allé sur l'île au sud d'ici, kupo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_001<tab>But, no doubt that area is just crawling with dreadful creatures. Adventurer, we need you to look for any signs he was there, or for any clues as to where he may have ran to. If you find something, then it may be worth braving this region's cruel monsters.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_001<tab>Elle doit être truffée de monstres... Je suis désolé de vous demander ça, mais est-ce que vous pourriez aller y jeter un œil à la recherche d'indices, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_002<tab>Bring any clues you find right back here, and we can continue our search when you return, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_002<tab>Je compte sur vous pour aller chercher des indices sur l'île au sud d'ici. Merci d'avance, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_010<tab>Ah, you're back at last! Did you find any sign of our friend, kupo?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_010<tab>Alors, est-ce que vous avez trouvé des indices sur cette île, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_011<tab>Hmm...some black feathers...and a kupo nut! This is one of the presents we brought for Moghome, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_011<tab>Deux plumes noires et... une noix de kupo<var 1D /var>!? Mais c'est celle qui nous manquait, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_012<tab>Just as I thought, he must've gone south! But, just how far south? It's hard to imagine him running too far without resting his wings...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_012<tab>Ça veut dire que notre compagnon est bel et bien passé par là<var 1D /var>! Mais si vous ne l'avez pas trouvé, c'est qu'il est peut-être allé encore plus au sud, kupo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_013<tab>Ah hah! These black feathers must belong to the giant bird that attacked. That means the bird might have flown off with the poor moogle...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_013<tab>Ces plumes noires que vous avez ramassées sont sûrement celles de l'oiseau qui nous a attaqués<var 1D /var>! Il a dû emporter notre compagnon, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_014<tab>We have to help him before he's eaten, or worse! Hurry, adventurer, we need to follow the bird's trail, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_014<tab>Mais oui<var 1D /var>! C'est fort probable<var 1D /var>! Il faut trouver le repaire de ces gros volatiles noirs<var 1D /var>! En route, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_021<tab>This just keeps getting worse and worse... I hope he's okay, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_021<tab>Ça commence à m'inquiéter. J'espère qu'il ne lui est rien arrivé, kupo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_020<tab>Look, there's a whole flock of those birds here. If indeed our companion was kidnapped, he's like to be around here. Let's split up and look for him, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_020<tab>Si un de ces gros oiseaux noirs a bel et bien emporté notre compagnon, il y a de fortes chances qu'on le trouve ici. Enfin, je veux dire que <var 1A 02 /var>vous<var 1A 01 /var> le trouviez, évidemment<var 1D /var>! Cherchez bien, il doit se cacher, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_034<tab>I hope he's okay... Hurry and find him before something terrible happens, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_034<tab>Ne nous décourageons pas<var 1D /var>! Notre compagnon est peut-être ici, caché dans le nid d'un de ces gros oiseaux. Cherchez bien, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_030<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> the egg... <var 1A 02 /var>Be<var 1A 01 /var> the egg, kupopo... Eggs don't get eaten, no they don't... <var 1A 02 /var>Be<var 1A 01 /var> the egg...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_030<tab>(Un œuf... Je suis un œuf... Tout blanc, tout lisse, kupo... Oups, non<var 1D /var>! Les œufs ne disent pas “kupo”<var 1D /var>! D'ailleurs ils ne parlent pas... Chuuut<var 1D /var>! Je n'ai rien dit, je suis un œuf...)

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_031<tab>...Oh no! I've been found out, kupopo! Don't...don't eat me─I'm so stringy, skin and bones...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_031<tab>Kupopooo<var 1D /var>! Je suis démasqué<var 1D /var>! Il va me manger, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_032<tab>...Oh, you're not one of those nasty birds!? Thank heavens, I thought I was done for! Good thing I wasn't─moogles are notoriously lacking in flavor, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_032<tab>Oh... Vous n'êtes pas un de ces gros oiseaux<var 1D /var>! Ouf<var 1D /var>! J'ai cru que j'allais y passer<var 1D /var>! J'ai eu la trouille de ma vie, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_033<tab>You mean the others have come looking for me? I knew they wouldn't leave me here, kupo! I'll return to them at once!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_033<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>? Mes compagnons sont venus me chercher<var 1D /var>? Kupopo<var 1D /var>! Merci, je m'en vais tout de suite les rejoindre, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_042<tab>You found him! I would've never thought to pretend to be an egg─in fact, chances are I'd end up eating it, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0201974_000_042<tab>Quel soulagement de voir notre compagnon sain et sauf, kupo<var 1D /var>! Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que ce gros emplumé l'avait pris pour un œuf<var 1D /var>! Merci de l'avoir retrouvé, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_043<tab>That was too close! I'll never eat another egg again, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_FORRESTMOG0301976_000_043<tab>J'ai cru que j'allais passer ma vie à imiter l'œuf... ou pire, finir en omelette<var 1D /var>! Je ne sais pas ce que je serais devenu sans vous, kupo<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_040<tab>Kupopo<var 1D /var>! Nous voilà enfin réunis<var 1D /var>! Et c'est grâce à vous, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_041<tab>We can finally make our way to Moghome! I've grown quite tired of all these flying monstrosities, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ911_01976_KUPLIKUKI_000_041<tab>Bon, il est grand temps d'aller retrouver les Mogs célestes<var 1D /var>! Et cette fois, nous irons à la bonne Écume des cieux<var 1D /var>! Ras-le-pompon d'<var 1A 02 /var>Ablablathia<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo<var 1D /var>!
